item.description:
The date for Becoming an Effortless Being (free evening) has changed to the following evening:  Wed., August 17.

You've experienced effortlessness...you are in a flow with life, present to what is, filled with awareness but without thoughts, open, happy, trusting.  This event will bring about that feeling, through a guided experience.  Also, you will learn ideas and tools as we all share what works to bring about the beauty of living effortlessly, more and more often, as we practice allowing the universe to sustain us.  This is a free event.  Donations are accepted to help with space rental.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight. Center is above Starbucks.
item.name: Becoming an effortless being (free evening) new date
